name: bittersweet blue ridge
description: i took this during the long drive home where i was violently ill after signing off the documents so my spouse and i could be legally married. our previous lover officiated for us and what was supposed to be a deeply personal, intimate story turned into a disaster of trying to figure out if the lover's roommate had given all the other disabled or immunocompromised people in the room covid. i've been too sick to edit more of that journey than this, but seeing the mountains in the south helped ground me during the ride home. remind me that - somewhere out there - magic is still possible, even if there was only the mountains to comfort me in the moment.
